short_summary: Courts Administration Service (CAS) - Stream 3 Information Management - Request for Proposal (RFP) to assist with Wi-Fi infrastructure for Canada
description: After a review of the risks, a competitive bid is required to meet the procurement requirements. Please note that procurements with a value below $800,000 do not require a competitive bid. Happily this is not a government requirement, but rather a CAS requirement to ensure that all goods and services are procured fairly, in a transparent manner, and to avoid any suggestion of favoritism.
tags: Canadawide, Treasury Board Procurement referred, Supply Arrangement Holder, TBIPS, RNP
